Press releases 
				
					05 July 2023
				
				
				 
		 Press Release: The European Commission’s proposal on Soil Monitoring and Resilience offers an opportunity to re-design EU agri-food systems by focusing on optimized use of nutrients and balanced fertilization Fertilizers Europe, representing the European fertilizer industry, welcomes the
European Commission’s ambition to boost soil management across the EU territory.
Today’s Soil Monitoring and Resilience proposal demonstrates a positive step
towards promoting sustainable soil and nutrient management at farm level,
ensuring soil fertility, and ultimately ensuring EU food security.
